resources.string: We would greatly appreciate it if you could Rate Us on the play store
Hi there, I´m Rodrigo the developer of this app. i just finished developing a new game would you like to try it ? It´s free !
Put a bill on the screen and you will se the watermarks and in the case of the uv light some colored marks. Make shure to be in a dark place if using the uv light
Conterfeit Money Detecotr was designed by Rodrigo Gonzalez Fantino. Did you like this app?
Put the note near the light and verify in the clearer area an animal and the note value

50 and 100 reais notes have an holographic sash which has the following effects: A) NOte value number and the "REAIS" word B) The animal changes his colour. C) The leaf (in the 50\'s notes) and the coral (in 100\' notes) reveals differens colours when you move it.
Put the note near the light and verify in the clearer area an animal and the note value

50 and 100 reais notes have an holographic sash which has the following effects: A) NOte value number and the "REAIS" word B) The animal changes his colour. C) The leaf (in the 50\'s notes) and the coral (in 100\' notes) reveals differens colours when you move it.
In both sides you can see a disc which turns from green to violet.

It has a metallic ink which becomes fluorescent green under ultroviolet light. Also you have a security transparent mark where you can read "BRC 10.000" when you see it against the light. Also has touch sensitive printing in the folowing areas: note denomination "Banco de la República" and in the picture
In both sides you cann see the Jorge Isaacs picture and a fragment from "Maria\'s" novel, when you see the note against the light

This note has 2 security threads. On the back you can see a dark band. And in the head you will see a thread in five silver segments, when you can see written "50 MIL PESOS COLOMBIA". Also you can read 50 MIL BRC near the down side of the picture. Finally, you should find some touch sensitive printing in some areas
